title: Hello there, Battery issue
content: Hence I'm quite unhappy with the battery. Performance my friends who is having same pixel4a getting the SOT of about 7hrs where I'm getting only 5 hrs which is very disappointing for me since this is not a small amount that I can afford of I waited for more than 3 yrs for this mobile and also I'm a very big fan of pixel.. please resolve this issue. Or give me some tips.
